data.title: Obituary for Ruth Martin
data.meta_description: Obituary for Ruth Martin |  Funeral services for Ruth Consford Martin, 97, of Martinsville, TX, will be held at 2:00 PM, Thursday, August 16, 2012, at First Baptist Church of Nacogdoches, with Dr. Allen Reed officiating....
data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Ruth Martin | August 13, 2012 | Nacogdoches,TX
data.text:
Coping with Grief

We would like to offer our sincere support to anyone coping with grief. Enter your email below for our complimentary daily grief messages. Messages run for up to one year and you can stop at any time. Your email will not be used for any other purpose.
